frame.name: Unrepentant
frame.description: Reloading after defeating a target causes the next burst to be a longer, more powerful superburst.

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description: Final blows with Unrepentant superbursts automatically reload your weapon and provide an Unrepentant superburst.
perks.name: Be the Danger

perks.description:
This weapon is slightly easier to hold and aim.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Smooth Grip
